list=The Lord of the Rings Extended Edition

column1: '''''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)''' is an extended version of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''. It has 50 minutes of additional footage added back into the film (bringing its total running time up to 250 minutes), as well as multiple documentaries about the making of the film as supplements.
The first disc contains the extended version of the film with the following audio commentaries:
* 31. Aragorn Takes the Paths of the Dead
This disc is a continuation of the first disc.
* 61. The Captain and the White Lady
* 48. The Battle of the Pelennor Fields
==The Appendices: Part Five - The War of the Ring (disc 3)==
* "J.R.R. Tolkien: The Legacy of Middle-Earth" Documentary
* "From Book To Script - Forging The Final Chapter" Documentary
* "The Peoples of Middle-Earth" galleries with audio
* "The Realms Of Middle-Earth" galleries with audio
* "Middle-Earth Atlas: Tracing the Journeys of the Fellowship" interactive map
* "[[New Zealand as Middle-earth]]" interactive map with on-location footage
==The Appendices: Part Six - The Passing of an Age (disc 4)==
* Introduction from [[Elijah Wood]], [[Sean Astin]], [[Billy Boyd]], [[Dominic Monaghan]]
* Production photos: a gallery of 69 images
* "Cameron Duncan: The Inspiration For Into the West" Documentary
* ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''
* [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)
